mapper.select: SELECT brandId, brandName, brandEngName, brandImageUrl FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT b.BRAND_ID AS brandId, b.BRAND_NAME_KR AS brandName, b.BRAND_NAME_ENG AS brandEngName, b.BRAND_IMAGE AS brandImageUrl, MAX(rvb.BRAND_VIEW_TIME) AS maxViewTime FROM recent_visited_brands rvb JOIN brands b ON rvb.BRAND_ID = b.BRAND_ID WHERE rvb.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY b.BRAND_ID, b.BRAND_NAME_KR, b.BRAND_NAME_ENG, b.BRAND_IMAGE ORDER BY maxViewTime DESC )
